title: Internet stocks aren’t immune to global equity selloff
text: The joy ride for internet stocks took a temporary detour on Monday.

title: Copper, a barometer for the global economy, drops to a 2-year low on trade war fears
text: Copper hit a two-year low on Monday, as investors fear what a full blown trade war between the U.S. and China will do to the global economy.

title: NOW It's A Bear Market
text: In response to slowing global economic growth, tariffs, and a lack of inflation pressure, the Fed decided to take overnight rates down a notch. To longtime market-watchers like me, this seems more like a desperate attempt to stop the economic cycle from playing out.

title: Here's where to hide as market tanks amid intensifying trade war
text: For investors looking to hide, here are the pockets of the market that have done well during huge market pullbacks in the past.

title: This is why large retailers like Amazon, Walmart & Costco won’t be as impacted by fresh tariffs
text: A 10% tariff scheduled to go into effect on September 1 drove declines in retail stocks on Monday morning, but Moody’s says there are some major retailers that are insulated from the impact.

title: Deep Dive: These stocks have plunged the most since Powell and Trump crashed investors’ party
text: What a difference a week can make. Following new highs for U.S. indexes, dozens of large-cap stocks have fallen since the Federal Reserve handed a gift to investors last week.

title: Market Futures Plunge Ahead
text: U.S. stock index futures plunged ahead of the market open on Monday after the trade war between the United States and China intensified.

title: US stocks slip at open as yuan slide deepens trade fears
text: US stocks shares fell sharply Monday after China let its currency to sink to an 11-year low against the dollar, fueling concern that Beijing is using the yuan as a weapon in an escalating tariff war with President Donald Trump. The Dow Jones Industrial Average plunged 550 points, while the S&P 500 dropped 2.1 percent.

title: Stocks still have room to fall, but look to buy the dip, JP Morgan says
text: J.P. Morgan's head of global and European equity expects an eventual rebound for stocks and says investors should "look to buy the dip."

title: Stock Futures Plunge as Trump Reignites Trade Tensions
text: U.S. stock index futures plunged ahead of the market open on Monday after the trade war between the United States and China intensified.

title: Wall Street slips at open as yuan slide deepens trade fears
text: U.S. stocks opened lower on Monday, extending a sell-off from last week, weighed down by a drop in technology shares and as China's yuan hit its lowest in more than a decade on escalating U.S.-China trade concerns.

title: As China Trade Fears Intensify, Caution Prevails On Wall Street To Start Week
text: With trade tensions flaring, some of the traditional “horsemen of risk” could be galloping today, with gold, bonds, the yen, and VIX all showing strength early on.

title: China's Yuan Falls To Lowest Level In 11 Years Sparking Fears Of Currency War
text: The move was in response to Donald Trump announcing more tariffs on Chinese goods last week.

title: Markets fall sharply amid fears of full-scale US-China currency war
text: Yuan devaluation latest escalation of trade war but could help offset US tariffs

title: China is just getting started with using its currency as weapon in the trade war, analysts say
text: The Chinese yuan fell to its lowest level against the dollar in 11 years and could continue to fall as China and the United States escalate their trade dispute, analysts say.

title: China's central bank denies it's devaluing country's currency to counter tariffs
text: China has allowed its yuan to break through 7 against the dollar for the first time in 11 years, but it insisted the move is not "competitive devaluation."

title: All 30 Dow stocks fall, led by Apple and Visa
text: Shares of all 30 Dow Jones Industrial Average components are falling in premarket trading Monday.

title: Trump accuses China of 'currency manipulation' as yuan drops to lowest in a decade
text: President Donald Trump accused China of manipulating its currency as the trade war between the world's largest economies keeps escalating.

title: Trade row slams stocks, yuan slumps to lowest in over a decade
text: Global stocks fell for a sixth day on Monday as an escalation of a trade war between the United States and China spooked markets and the yuan fell to its lowest levels in over a decade.

title: Morgan Stanley: If trade war escalates, a recession will be here in 3 quarters
text: Morgan Stanley explained on Monday why it believes "we will enter recession in 3 quarters" if the trade war continues to escalate.

title: Drug industry urges Canada to act early on U.S. import plan
text: Canada's main pharmaceutical lobby group has urged the government not to wait for drug shortages before responding to U.S. plans to import Canadian drugs, according to documents seen by Reuters.

title: China Hints at Weaponizing Its Currency, Rattling Markets
text: Beijing’s willingness to let the renminbi weaken could signal a new phase in the U.S.-China trade war that might ripple through the global financial system.

title: Global Markets Hit After China Devalues Yuan, Stops US Farm Imports
text: China has "effectively weaponized its exchange rate" against the U.S., according to one analyst.

title: Bitcoin jumps 9% to surge past $11,000 while stocks dive on trade worries
text: Bitcoin soared 9% on Monday, performing like a safe haven asset as it edged past $11,000 for the first time since around mid-July.

title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates For August 5 2019
text: European stocks slumped with U.S. equity on Monday, tracking a sell-off across Asia after China escalated its trade dispute with America.

text: Oil prices could soon skyrocket to more than $100 a barrel amid escalating tensions in the Middle East, one oil analyst told CNBC Friday.

title: Trade friction hits stocks, yuan slumps to lowest in over a decade

title: Bitcoin To Break This Year's High; S&P 500 May Drop By 10%

title: 10-year Treasury yield plunges below 1.75% after China counters US trade action
text: Financial markets tumbled as trade friction prompted a stampede into relative safe harbors, including bonds, gold and the Japanese yen.

title: Europe stocks slump to start the week
text: European stocks opened the week with more selling as the Chinese yuan fell through a key level: The U.K.

title: Asia stocks at six-month lows, yuan slumps as investors flee to safety
text: Asian shares suffered their steepest daily drop in 10 months on Monday, as Sino-U.S. trade friction sent the yuan slumping to a more than decade trough and stampeded investors into safe harbors including the yen, bonds and gold.

title: China's yuan just weakened to an important level. One analyst says it's 'retaliation' for tariffs
text: The Chinese yuan crossed a closely watched 7 barrier against the dollar on Monday as trade tensions rise.

title: Chinese Yuan Falls Sharply, Sending BTC, ETH, XRP, And LTC Soaring
